did.unittitle: George Santayana, Cambridge, [Massachusetts], to Stone & Kimball, [ Chicago]

scopecontent.p: [Requests copies of his book of poems, having given his last to Fullerton and wishing to give 2 others away before leaving for Europe; indicates he has more material available for a second edition if that seems feasible; observes the move to Chicagomust be a positive one although less convenient for himself; states that to be published from Chicagowould be like being a "poet of the future."]
